lyric:
[00:13.310]Somebody mixed my medicine
[00:19.250]Somebody mixed my medicine
[00:25.610]When you hurt when you sleep
[00:27.330]And you sleep where you lie
[00:29.420]Now your in deep and now your gonna cry
[00:32.510]You got a woman to your left and a boy to your right
[00:35.650]Start to sweat so hold me tight
[00:38.900]Somebody mixed my medicine
[00:43.360]I don't know what I'm on
[00:45.250]Somebody mixed my medicine
[00:49.690]But baby it's all gone
[00:51.610]Somebody mixed my medicine
[00:54.830]Somebody's in my head again
[00:58.010]Somebody mixed my medicine
[01:01.090]Again, again
[01:04.180]I'll drink what you leak
[01:05.730]And smoke what you sigh
[01:07.690]Straight across the room with a look in your eye
[01:10.680]I got a man to the left and a girl to the right
[01:14.000]Start to sweat so hold me tight
[01:17.300]Somebody mixed my medicine
[01:21.680]I don't know what I'm on
[01:23.740]Somebody mixed my medicine
[01:28.070]But baby it's all gone
[01:30.000]Somebody mixed my medicine
[01:33.210]Somebody's in my head again
[01:36.460]Somebody mixed my medicine
[01:39.550]Again, again
[01:42.890]There a tiger in the room and a baby in a closet
[01:46.170]Pour another drink mom i don't even want it
[01:49.390]Then I turn around and think i see someone that looks like you
[01:55.200]You hurt when you sleep
[01:56.950]And you sleep where you lie
[01:58.700]Now your in deep and now your gonna cry
[02:01.940]You got a woman th the left and a boy to the right
[02:05.230]Start to sweat so hold me tight
[02:08.470]Somebody mixed my medicine
[02:12.860]I don't know what I'm on
[02:15.050]Somebody mixed my medicine
[02:19.240]But baby it's all gone
[02:21.310]Somebody mixed my medicine
[02:24.410]Somebody's in my head again
[02:27.620]Somebody mixed my medicine
[02:30.630]Again, again, again, again, again, again, again, again
[02:53.200]Somebody mixed my medicine
[02:59.520]Somebody mixed my medicine
[03:06.040]Somebody mixed my medicine
tlyric:
[by:Deep深]
[00:13.310]有人搞乱了我的药
[00:19.250]有人搞乱了我的药
[00:25.610]沉睡时你如此疼痛
[00:27.330]你在倒下的地方睡着了
[00:29.420]现在你困在深处想要哭泣
[00:32.510]你的左边有个女人右边有个男的
[00:35.650]开始出汗 那么抱紧我
[00:38.900]有人搞乱了我的药
[00:43.360]我不知道我这是中了什么
[00:45.250]有人搞乱了我的药
[00:49.690]可是宝贝儿都没事了
[00:51.610]有人搞乱了我的药
[00:54.830]某人又在我脑中浮现
[00:58.010]有人搞乱了我的药
[01:01.090]又一次…又一次……
[01:04.180]你漏掉的水我都会喝
[01:05.730]你吐的烟圈我也会吸
[01:07.690]你看着我，穿过房间
[01:10.680]我左边有一个男人，右边有个姑娘
[01:14.000]开始冒汗…抱住我…
[01:17.300]有人搞乱了我的药
[01:21.680]我不知道我是怎么了
[01:23.740]有人搞乱了我的药
[01:28.070]可是宝贝儿都没事了
[01:30.000]有人搞乱了我的药
[01:33.210]某人又在我脑中浮现
[01:36.460]有人搞乱了我的药
[01:39.550]又来…又一次……
[01:42.890]房间里有只老虎，衣柜里有个婴儿
[01:46.170]再来一杯酒，哦…我并不想喝的……
[01:49.390]然后我转过身，似乎看见了一个很像你的人
[01:55.200]你入睡时如此疼痛
[01:56.950]躺下就没醒来
[01:58.700]现在你深困于此想要哭泣
[02:01.940]你的左边有个女人右边有个男人
[02:05.230]开始出汗…抱紧我……
[02:08.470]有人搞乱了我的药
[02:12.860]我不知道我这是怎么了
[02:15.050]有人搞乱了我的药
[02:19.240]可是宝贝儿都没事了
[02:21.310]有人搞乱了我的药
[02:24.410]他又在我的脑海里浮现
[02:27.620]有人搞乱了我的药
[02:30.630]一次……又一次……又一次……又一次……又……
[02:53.200]有人搞乱了我的药
[02:59.520]有人搞乱了我的药
[03:06.040]有人搞乱了我的药…………
